tool.name: pmxgentop
tool.description: : Wrapper class for the `PMX gentop <https://github.com/deGrootLab/pmx>`_ module.

param.name: input_top_zip_path
param.label: input ZIP file
param.help: Path the input GROMACS topology TOP and ITP files in zip format. Format: [input].zip

param.name: outname_output_top_zip_path
param.label: output ZIP name
param.help: Path the output TOP topology in zip format Format: [output].zip

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: split
param.label: split
param.help: Print a 3 to 1 letter residue list.

param.name: dna
param.label: dna
param.help: Generate hybrid residue for the DNA nucleotides.

param.name: rna
param.label: rna
param.help: Generate hybrid residue for the RNA nucleotides.

param.name: output_top_name
param.label: output_top_name
param.help: Name of the output top file.

param.name: keyword_list
param.label: keyword_list
param.help: List of comma separated Keywords to match top and itp files.

param.name: pmx_cli_path
param.label: pmx_cli_path
param.help: Path to the PMX Python2.7 client.
